overview: The first segment of this program presents Rubinstein at a recording session playing for his children and exhibiting his technique with the music of Liszt, Chopin, and Mendelssohn.  The second segment shows the pianist at home in an all-Chopin program.  The final segment features Rubinstein, Heifetz, and Piatigorsky interpreting Schubert and Mendelssohn.
title: Arthur Rubinstein
